title: Madonna's daughter Lourdes Leon cuts a stylish figure in jeans and a T-shirt with a black jacket
text:
She sat front row at the Proenza Schouler New York Fashion Week Show last month.

And on Tuesday, Lourdes Leon was spotted stepping out in New York City rocking a casual yet chic look.

The 22-year-old beauty, who is the eldest child of Madonna, paired blue jeans with a T-shirt, adding a black jacket.

Stylish: Lourdes Leon was spotted stepping out in New York City rocking a casual yet chic look on Tuesday

The model chose blue denim bottoms, adding a tucked in dark purple T-shirt; the dark haired beauty layered on a black and silver accented jacket.

Lourdes wore red, blue and white patterned socks with lace up boots as she stepped out in the Big Apple.

She added large hoop earrings and a colorful Louis Vuitton shoulder bag, adding sunglasses over her tresses.

Lourdes, who left her long brunette locks loose around her, opted to go makeup free, revealing her stunning natural beauty.

Chic: The 22-year-old beauty, who is the eldest child of Madonna, paired blue jeans with a T-shirt, adding a black jacket

Last month, Lourdes was seen sitting front row center at the Proenza Schouler NYFW show.

The breathtaking beauty looked incredible in a simple white look, adding matte rose pink lipstick on her pout.

Lourdes wore her cascading long hair loose around her, framing her delicate features.

Commanding attention: Last month, Lourdes was seen sitting front row center at the Proenza Schouler NYFW show; pictured September 10, 2019 at the show

A vision: The breathtaking beauty looked incredible in a simple white look, adding matte rose pink lipstick on her pout

Lourdes Ciccone Leon is the daughter of Madonna and Carlos Leon; she was born on October 14, 1996.

The model is the eldest sister to Rocco, 19, David, 13, Mercy, 13, and seven-year-old twins Estere and Stelle.

Lourdes made her own New York Fashion Week debut last year at the Gypsy Sport's Spring 2019 show.

Model beauty: Lourdes wore her cascading long hair loose around her, framing her delicate features

Beauty: Lourdes Ciccone Leon is the daughter of Madonna and Carlos Leon; she was born on October 14, 1996
description: She sat front row at the Proenza Schouler New York Fashion Week Show last month. And on Tuesday, Lourdes Leon was spotted stepping out in New York City rocking a casual yet chic look.
